snippet: DUKE--Robin Chandler. The Pilgrims of the United States are saddened by the death of their former Treasurer and Executive Committee colleague. Ambassador Duke was a distinguished civic, business, and social leader and a leader as well in her commitments to politics, social advocacy, and philanthropy. We convey our deepest condolences to her family. Miner H. Warner, President Thomas L. Pulling, Secretary Peter Lawson-Johnston, Treasurer 1/3
lead_paragraph: DUKE--Robin Chandler. The Pilgrims of the United States are saddened by the death of their former Treasurer and Executive Committee colleague. Ambassador Duke was a distinguished civic, business, and social leader and a leader as well in her commitments to politics, social advocacy, and philanthropy. We convey our deepest condolences to her family. Miner H. Warner, President Thomas L. Pulling, Secretary Peter Lawson-Johnston, Treasurer 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUKE, ROBIN CHANDLER
